meanings.definition: Not giving sufficient attention or thought to avoiding harm or errors.
meanings.sent1: He made a careless mistake on his test by not checking his answers.
meanings.sent2: She is known for her careless behavior when it comes to handling fragile items.
meanings.sent3: The careless squirrel forgot where it buried its nuts and couldn't find them later.
meanings.sent4: The careless driver zoomed through the red light, risking a dangerous collision.
meanings.sent5: The careless student lost his textbook and had to pay for a replacement.

meanings.definition: Done or said without enough thought or attention.
meanings.sent1: The careless comment he made hurt her feelings unintentionally.
meanings.sent2: She regretted her careless decision to skip breakfast before the long hike.
meanings.sent3: The careless shopper accidentally bought two of the same item without realizing.
meanings.sent4: His careless promise to always be there for her was quickly forgotten.
meanings.sent5: The careless text message he sent had unintended consequences.

meanings.sent1: The careless attitude of the group towards the project led to its failure.
meanings.sent2: She gave a careless shrug when asked about the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: The careless cat ignored the mouse running right in front of it.
meanings.sent4: His careless response to her question showed his lack of interest.
meanings.sent5: The careless expression on his face revealed his disinterest in the conversation.
